Package climatemonitoring.core

Class ApplicationSpecification

java.lang.Object
climatemonitoring.core.ApplicationSpecification
public class ApplicationSpecification extends Object
The class that holds the application settings to use during its creation. It holds the settings for both Headless and GUI configuration
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
adellafrattina
See Also:

    Time (in milliseconds) that elapses between two iterations of the main loop.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

  • Field Details

    • title

      public String title
      The desired window name. "App" by default

    • width

      public int width
      The desired window width in pixels. Meaningful only in GUI configuration. 1280 by default

    • height

      public int height
      The desired window height in pixels. Meaningful only in GUI configuration. 720 by default

    • isFullscreen

      public boolean isFullscreen
      If the application should start as fullscreen False by default

    • vSync

      public boolean vSync
      If the application should enable the vertical synchronization (The application's frame rate will be the monitor's frame rate). False by default because it is preferable to use the Application.setFramerateLimit(int) method to reduce the CPU and GPU utilization

    • sleepDuration

      public long sleepDuration
      Time (in milliseconds) that elapses between two iterations of the main loop. Meaningful only in headless configuration. 10 by default

      public ApplicationSpecification()
